header.importAccMessage: Pali is the only extension wallet with UTXO! To import any wallet, you need to change to one EVM network.
header.wouldYouLikeTo: Would like to continue with the active account?
header.ifYouContinueWith: If you continue with the active account, Pali will change the connected account for
header.andYouWillNeed: and you will need to start the transaction again.
header.itSeemsThatYou: It seems that you are currently using a Trezor-based account that was created specifically for this network. If you wish to use a different network, you can switch to another active account by selecting a preferred Pali Account.

connections.onlyConnect: Only connect with sites you trust.

seedConfirm.youShould: You should now have your recovery phrase and your wallet password written down for future reference.

send.cantCompleteApprove: Can't complete approve. Try again later.
send.approveSuccessfulMessage: Your approve has been successfully submitted. You can see more details under activity on your home page.
send.changeFields: Change fields values and try again.
send.byGrantingPermission: By granting permission, you are authorizing the following contract to access your funds
send.thereIsAFee: There is a fee associated with this request.
send.canAccess: can access and spend up to this maximum amount.
send.cantCompleteTxs: Can't complete transaction. Try again later.
send.feeError: Error in the proccess to get fee values, please verify your balance and try again later.
send.txSuccessfullMessage: Your transaction has been successfully submitted. You can see more details under activity on your home page.
send.toWithdraw: to withdraw and spend up to the following amount
send.gasLimitMessage: Gas limit need to be greater than 1000
send.contractEstimateError: We were not able to estimate gas. There might be an error in the contract and this transaction may fail.
send.rpcEstimateError: The current RPC provider couldn't estimate the gas for this transaction. Therefore, we'll estimate the gas using the existing block data for your transaction.
send.enoughFunds: You don't have enough funds for this transactions.
send.txWillFail: The transaction will fail, fix it and try again!
send.decodificationNotAvailable: The decodification for this transaction is not available

settings.clickHereSupport: Entre em contato com nossa equipe no canal discord #pali_support
settings.toAccess: To access the support link, you need to give permission or copy and paste the link below
settings.refreshButtonWarning: The refresh button dispatches multiple requests to the blockchain through an RPC, if you activating this be sure to add in your own paid RPC providers to avoid reaching the public RPCs rate-limit. Use it at your own accountability
settings.hereYouCanEnable: Here, you can enable advanced settings in Pali. Use them responsibly and at your own risk.
settings.yourWalletWasConfigured: Your wallet was configured successfully. You can change it at any time.
settings.youCanSetAutolock: You can set auto lock timer. Default is 5 minutes after no activity. Maximum is 120 minutes.
settings.yourAutolockWasConfigured: Your auto lock was configured successfully. You can change it at any time.
settings.isConnected: is connected to these sites. They can view your account public information.
settings.isNotConnected: is not connected to any sites. To connect to a Pali compatible dApp, find the connect button on their site.
settings.viewTheAddresses: View the addresses of your permitted accounts
settings.selectTheHardware: Select the hardware wallet you'd like
settings.orderTrezor: Order a Trezor wallet and keep your funds in cold storage.
settings.connectYourHardwareWallet: Connect your hardware wallet directly to your computer.
settings.startUsingSys: Start using SYS powered sites and more
settings.useYourHardwareAccount: Use your hardware account like you would with any SYS account. Connect to SYS web3 sites, send SYS, buy and store SPT tokens.
settings.trezorDoesntSupport: Trezor doesn't support SYS testnet. Please, change your network to be able to connect to trezor.
settings.yourNewAccount: Your new account has been created
settings.nowYouWill: Now you will see the values in your wallet in SYS and
settings.setYourPreferred: Set your preferred currency for displaying the value of your assets.
settings.checkYourBalance: Check your balance in different currencies
settings.label: Label
settings.trezorSiteWarning: trezor.io has a rate limit for simultaneous requests, so we can't use it for now
settings.youCanEdit: You can edit this later if you need on network settings menu.
settings.youCanEditAccount: You can edit this later if you need on accounts settings menu.
settings.thisWillAllow: This will allow this network to be used within Pali.
settings.paliDoesNotVerify: Pali does not verify custom networks.
settings.thisWillAllowToken: This will allow this token to be used within Pali.
settings.paliDoesNotVerifyToken: Pali does not verify custom tokens.
settings.thisWillForget: This will forget the wallet created with your current seed phrase. If in the future you want to use Pali again, you will need to create a new wallet using your seed or creating a new one.
settings.youStillHave: You still have funds in your wallet. Paste your seed phrase below to forget wallet.
settings.importAccountsWont: Imported accounts won't link to your initial Pali account Secret Recovery Phrase.
settings.currentlyThePrivate: Currently, the privateKeys feature is only supported in tSelect Typehe EVM/Web3 chains context. Therefore, UTXO networks won't be accessible while using a PrivateKey account. To regain access to UTXO networks, switch to a Pali Native Account or a Trezor Account.
settings.youCannotRemoveActiveNetwork: You cannot remove the active network
settings.keepYourSeed: Keep your seed phrase secret! Anyone with your seed phrase can access any account connected to this wallet and steal your assets
settings.thisIsYourAccountIndexer: This is your account root indexer to check your full balance for
settings.itIsntAReceivingAddress: it isn't a receiving address. DO NOT SEND FUNDS TO THESE ADDRESSES, YOU WILL LOSE THEM!
settings.toUseAnother: To use another ETH wallet, you can disable window.ethereum injected by Pali.
settings.thisWillSwitch: This will switch the selected network within Pali to a previously added network
settings.thisActionErases: This action erases your current wallet.
settings.toRestoreThis: To restore this current wallet in the future ensure you have the recovery phrase.
settings.allYourSettings: All your settings, like custom tokens and imported accounts, will get lost, however, your funds it’s saved!
settings.errorMinutes: o valor para o autolock deve ser entre 5 e 120 minutos
settings.connectYourWalletAndClick: CONECTE SUA {{hardwalletName}} E CLIQUE PARA CONECTAR!

This signature could potentially perform any operation on your account's behalf, including granting complete control of your account and all of its assets to the requesting site. Only sign this message if you know what you're doing or completely trust the requesting site.
